identity.mission: Create a professional, high-trust corporate LMS that feels alive, not static.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Blend Alison's utility with Flowitec's brand.
Emotion First: Confidence, Growth, and Clarity.
Content is King: Course content drives the design.
Zoom In: Focus on course outcomes and learner progress.
Negative Space: Use whitespace to reduce cognitive load.

grids.course_list: flex overflow-x-auto snap-x snap-mandatory gap-6 pb-8 scrollbar-hide

CourseCard.description: Alison-style card with hover reveal actions
specs: Base: White bg, rounded-lg, shadow-sm, border border-slate-200
Content: Title (line-clamp-2), Rating (Stars), Duration, Learner Count
Hover State: Card lifts (-translate-y-2), Shadow increases (shadow-xl)
Overlay: 'Start Learning' (Primary Btn) and 'More Info' (Secondary Btn) slide up from bottom or fade in on hover

CourseCarousel.description: Horizontal scrolling container for course cards
specs: Navigation: Chevron Left/Right buttons positioned absolute outside or on edges
Behavior: Snap to slide, smooth scroll
Background: Gradient from Primary/10 to Transparent or subtle pattern
Content: H1 Headline, Subtext, Large Search Bar with Category Dropdown
State: Active tab gets Primary Color background/text
Categories: Popular, Top Diplomas, Top Certificates, New Courses

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Implement 'CourseCard' with the specific hover effect described. This is the core 'Alison-style' feature.
2. Use 'embla-carousel-react' for all course lists. Do not use standard overflow-scroll without snap.
3. Redesign the 'CourseDetail' page to have a sidebar for enrollment and a main content area for 'You Will Learn' outcomes.
4. Ensure the 'Dashboard' uses a Bento grid layout for stats.
7. Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
